components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Voice Intelligence Error When Attempting to Use a Previously Deleted Service Name

incident_updates.body: The issue causing errors when Services are created with a previously used name, relating to Voice Intelligence has been identified. We are still actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The issue causing errors when Services are created with a previously used name, relating to Voice Intelligence has been identified. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently experiencing issues with Voice Intelligence. Creating a Service with the same name as a previously deleted Service name triggers an error. Our engineers are investigating this and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Voice Intelligence. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Client Web

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures To T-Mobile Network In The US via Subset of Longcodes

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery failures to the T-Mobile Network in the US via a subset of longcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carriers Maintenance - Small US Carriers

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 May 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 09 May 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK.
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 24 May 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 25 May 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
12 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 12 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
19 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 19 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
24 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
26 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
